column5: Hey Shawn,  You've been waiting for this back surgery for a long time now and today's the day.  Good luck and be sure not to rush the recovery!!  Take it easy....the Quinte G2G is only a short time away.  Best wishes for a quick recovery....talk to you tonite bud!  Cliff, Carole and family.
Good luck Shawn, I know how much that back has been bothering you.  I hope it goes smooth and you have a smooth recovery.

Didn't know you were having back problems Shawn, but best of luck today !!  I had back surgery myself a few years ago and it was a piece of cake, nothing like I thought it would be, so hopefully it'll all go as well for you
It'll be fine Shawn, You're a big tough guy! Just take it easy and I'm sure you'll be back to tip top shape in no time, just in time for the g2g  Best of luck  Shawn!  Take care, Kevin
Good Luck!  Hope recovery goes well
good luck and hope you have a quick recovery
Best of luck to you Shawn.I hope you have a speedy recovery.  Dan
Milk it bud! Soak up the attention! Try to remember to wince and moan when others are looking but don't make it too obvious. Good luck today Shawn!! -Brian
Hope all went well with the surgery Shawn and you have a quick recovery.
Recover quick and fully Shawn... you'll be ready to fish again in no time, I am sure
Please listen to what the docs say. Take care of you and heal fast.
Good Luck Shawn, you're a strong lad, you'll pull out of this just fine.  Joey
this better be successful or I'll need that operation on my ears
Wishing you a speedy recovery...and I agree...listen to the docs and milk it.
good luck man......hope it all goes swimmingly
